CustomField.formula: (CASE(litify_pm__Status__c, 'Lead Generated', 1, 'Intake Scheduled', 2, 'In Contact/Under Review', 3, 'Missed Appointment', 4, 'Intake Package Sent', 5, 'Attempting to Contact', 6, 'Questionnaire', 7, 'Pending Referral', 8, 99) * 10) + Case_Type_Priority__c
CustomField.label: Priority Score
